info.name: Appdome Build-2Secure
info.description: With Appdome Build-2Secure plugin, you can easily secure and customize your mobile apps on Jetbrains TeamCity as part of your build and deploy process. See full description and tutorial at: https://www.appdome.com/how-to/devsecops-automation-mobile-cicd/mobile-app-security-anti-fraud-cicd/secure-android-ios-apps-in-teamcity-ci-cd-pipelines/
